hello: I would like to migrate a system from SUSE LINUX 9.3 Pro with KDE with to Ubuntu with GNOME, while keep using the same basic software (KMail and Konqueror) and also migrating my email and mail settings. Would just copying my KDE settings directory to Ubuntu work?
yes, copying over ~/.kde should be fine.  take a backup first.  you'll also need to copy over any e-mail directories
